channel.title: [Definitely not a Joke Class Suggestion]The Spider
channel.description: > # [color=darkgray]The Spider[/color] > **[color=darkgray]Neutral Killer[/color]** > > **Passive (Alexa)** - Immune to Death at Night. Your abilities do not count as visiting. > **Passive (This is)** - If you are prevented from killing a player or the player doesn't die , get an extra use of **Despacito**. > > **Day Ability (So)** - Target player can not visit you tonight.(3 Uses) > **Day Ability (Sad)** - Target player will visit your target tonight instead of you. They will be prevented from doing their night action.(2 Uses - Usable D1) > > **Night Ability (Play)** - Kill a player.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Despacito)** - Kill a player. You will be guaranteed to kill them.(0 Uses) > ~~**Goal::b:ecome a meme.**~~ > **Goal: Kill all of those who would oppose you.** > *The best picture the world has ever seen:* >![download|225x225](upload://4x7H51ebdfIo7nL9y7wL7aQmqUq.png)

item.title: [Definitely not a Joke Class Suggestion]The Spider
item.dc:creator: CloverPlayer
item.description:
He has to be
-Poison/Bleed immune
-Vote immune
-Fool immune
-Unlimited Despacito’s
-Kill all visitors
-Kill Prince no matter what
-BD will always think it’s Evil King even if they save people with safeguard
Then this will be the best class to exist

Read full topic
item.source: [Definitely not a Joke Class Suggestion]The Spider

item.title: [Definitely not a Joke Class Suggestion]The Spider
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.source: [Definitely not a Joke Class Suggestion]The Spider

item.title: [Definitely not a Joke Class Suggestion]The Spider
item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
NAOtheRitualist:

Passive (Alexa) - Immune to Death at Night. Your abilities do not count as visiting.
Passive (This is) - If you are prevented from killing a player or the player doesn’t die , get an extra use of Despacito .

Fine for the class mechanics

NAOtheRitualist:

Day Ability (So) - Target player can not visit you tonight.(3 Uses)
Day Ability (Sad) - Target player will visit your target tonight instead of you. They will be prevented from doing their night action.(2 Uses - Usable D1)

So how does So work mechanically? If someone tries to visit you they get an occ/prevented message?

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Play) - Kill a player.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Despacito) - Kill a player. You will be guaranteed to kill them.(0 Uses)
Goal:ecome a meme.
Goal: Kill all of those who would oppose you.

Doesn’t seem to bad actually. Just make him immune to poison/bleeding and you’re good to go

Read full topic

item.title: [Definitely not a Joke Class Suggestion]The Spider
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Spider

Neutral Killer

Passive (Alexa) - Immune to Death at Night. Your abilities do not count as visiting.
Passive (This is) - If you are prevented from killing a player or the player doesn’t die , get an extra use of Despacito.

Day Ability (So) - Target player can not visit you tonight.(3 Uses)
Day Ability (Sad) - Target player will visit your target tonight instead of you. They will be prevented from doing their night action.(2 Uses - Usable D1)

Night Ability (Play) - Kill a player.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Despacito) - Kill a player. You will be guaranteed to kill them.(0 Uses)
Goal:ecome a meme.
Goal: Kill all of those who would oppose you.
The best picture the world has ever seen:

Read full topic
item.source: [Definitely not a Joke Class Suggestion]The Spider
